creator: Name of the tool, responsible for the creation of this file
persona: Name of the Persona with a specific scenario
testDirectory: Path of the test folder for this specific testerName
voiceCharacter: Name of the Phrase Render Tool Voice Character
languageCode: Language code of the spoken responses

scenarios.name: scenarioName
scenarios.description: <html> Info for every scenarioTab to provide SimulationOperator a mouseover Info Field with this text</html>
scenarios.definitionOfDone: Info text or tasks, the user has to trigger/use to consider this scenario as done

intents.name: intentName
utterances: array of utterances that trigger this intent

responses.subject: subjectName
responses.audio: name of the audio file with the spoken text as: {scenarioName}_{intentName}_{subjectName}.aiff
